title: FS/T: T206 Owen SGC 60 & White SGC 40
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS/T: T206 Owen SGC 60 & White SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Two cards left from original lot as indicated. I will accept Paypal (with 3%) or check or money order. I'll pay postage and del. conf., ins. is on you. The cards are as follows:
Frank Smith (F. Smith on Front)       Piedmont 150            SGC 60    SOLD
Frank Owen                                  Sweet Caporal 150    SGC 60    $80
Frank Isbell                                   Sweet Caporal 350   SGC 60     SOLD
Patsy Dougherty                            Polar Bear               SGC 50    SOLD
Lee Tannehill (L. Tannehill on Front)  Sweet Caporal 150   SGC 50    SOLD
Lee Tannehill (Tannehill on Front)      Piedmont 350/460    SGC 50    SOLD
Billy Purtell                                    Piedmont 350          SGC 50    SOLD
Billy Payne                                    Piedmont 350/460    SGC 50    SOLD
Doc White (pitching)                       Old Mill                  SGC 40    SOLD
Frank Smith (Chicago, White Cap)     Sweet Caporal 350   SGC 40    $45
I can scan the backs if necessary.
Cards available as singles for sale. Will also consider trades for SGC 40 (no creases) or better T206 HOF'ers or SGC 20-40 T3 Turkey Red baseball.
One and only price reduction before ebay Sun. night. These are EXTRA nice cards fo the grade. Thanks!
